name: Teleporter
description: Teleporter is the Social VR world of gamers that brings video-game enthusiasts together in VR to play, watch & interact with video games in a 3D sci-fi world. Hang out with friends, find game mates & play together, enjoy old-school arcade games, and watch esports matches anytime here.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
